findings.title: Short termination or notice windows
findings.rationale: Short or strict notice windows can lead to accidental renewals or unintended termination.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...4. TERM AND TERMINATION Either party may terminate this Agreement with 30 days written notice for any reason....
findings.context:
see receives no ownership interest or assignment rights.

3. PAYMENT TERMS
Licensee shall pay monthly subscription fees of $3,000, due on the first of each month.

4. TERM AND TERMINATION
Either party may terminate this Agreement with 30 days written notice for any reason.

5. INDEMNIFICATION
Mutual indemnification: each party indemnifies the other for its own breach, capped at annual subscription fees.

6

changes: Added 8 high-signal rules (attorneys fees, liability cap carveouts, assignment restrictions, etc.)
Implemented clause-level anchoring and false-positive suppression
